posts.post_content:
Selling first as a lot. 176 cards. Most are PSA/SGC 2-4. All are graded. Refocusing my collection is my reason for selling
Asking $SALE PENDING net to me insured and shipped. References available if needed. 
Please pm with any questions. I’ll take it wins over ongoing negotiations. 
Link to scans- [url]https://www.flickr.com/photos/157008903@N05/albums/72157677585814457[/url]
All cards after Wolter in scans are not available. 

I WILL BUMP THREAD IF AND WHEN I BREAK UP THE LOT.  Trying to sell as a lot. 

Thanks for looking. 
Eric

Will be taking offers today and then if no takers will break it up. 
Thanks
Eric

Lot is sale pending.  thanks to all of those who inquired about individual cards. 
Eric
